warrior.desc: The masters of arms, warriors are commonly found at the front of battle clad in heavy armour. They have a wide variety of available weapons, shields and armour. Warriors are one of the few classes to not directly employ magic in any way, and generally do not trust it.
warrior.equipment: Damaged Chain Armour, Damaged Short Sword, Damaged Wooden Shield
warrior.label: Warrior
warrior.name: warrior
warrior.proficiencies: Light Armour, Medium Armour, Heavy Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons, Medium Weapons, Large Weapons, Ranged Weapons, Small Shields, Medium Shields, Large Shields

skills.name: berserk
skills.label: Berserk
skills.desc: Passive - The character enters a state of rage when wounded, dealing +1d6 damage on all attacks (increases to +2d6 at level 7, +3d6 at level 13, and +4d6 at level 19)

skills.name: tauntingstrike
skills.label: Taunting Strike
skills.desc: Action - attack vs dodge, if it hits deal weapon damage and the target must attack you on their next turn

wizard.desc: Harnessing the arcane and the elements of fire and ice, wizards unleash fury upon their foes. Their main role in combat is damage dealing.
wizard.equipment: Damaged Cloth Robe, Damaged Magic Staff (Arcane)
wizard.label: Wizard
wizard.name: wizard

skills.name: arcanemissiles
skills.label: Arcane Missiles
skills.desc: Action - attack INT vs INT on an enemy target within 10m, if it hits it does +1d4 + weapon arcane damage. Requires a magic weapon.
